Employment opportunities for lawyers, law students, and legal professionals. -----

Justia Legal Jobs Newsletter

Hello,

We hope you are doing OK in these challenging times and welcome to the latest issue of the Justia Jobs newsletter. A couple of brief notes:

If you apply for one of these jobs please indicate that you learned about it via Justia.

If your organization is hiring you can contact us at legaljobs@justia.com for details on how your job can be included in the next issue.

Feel free to share this newsletter. New subscribers can sign-up here.

We will continue publishing this newsletter and are evaluating additional ways to support job seekers during these times. Justia has also recently published a resource page on unemployment benefits that are available due to COVID-19.

This new service is a work in progress and we welcome your feedback at legaljobs@justia.com.

Best,
Justia Legal Jobs Team
